heading: Tuesday Night
text: Mainly clear or becoming so, except partly cloudy far north and in the Berkshires. Lows in the low to mid 20s south and in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys, teens elsewhere north. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph early, then diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly to mostly sunny. Highs in the low to mid 40s in the south, and mid 30s to around 40 north. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 15 mph.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Clear early, then increasing clouds west to east. Lows in the low to mid 20s south and in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys, teens elsewhere north, and some single digits in the cold hollows. Winds becoming light and variable.
